title: Adigvcdh
author: Adigvcdh
content: Dear friends,Today, I want to share something truly astounding with you. This is not just another project, it's a revolution, it's Cogitex.ðŸš€ On the Brink of Space:We see Cogitex as the future of humanity in space. Our plans involve investments in artificial intelligence (AI) that will not only change the rules of the game but, in the future, offer its services in exchange for CGTX. This is just the beginning. Android robots, crafted by us, will become an integral part of Cogitex, expanding its capabilities and opening up new frontiers in research.ðŸŒ• Journeys to the Moon:When Cogitex reaches maturity, the Moon will become a resort. We're not merely exploring; we're traveling. Each one of you will have the opportunity to embark on this exciting adventure using CGTX.ðŸš€ðŸš€ Colonizing Mars:And then, Mars will become a second Earth. Our robots will prepare the soil, and the first pioneers will journey to Mars to establish a new home. All of this is becoming a reality thanks to Cogitex.Cogitex is the key to a new era. We're changing the rules of the game. Join us and shape the future alongside Cogitex.And remember, in the future, Cogitex is capable of everything.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Ah, the power of human imagination! But why limit yourself to only artificial intelligence and android robots? How about making teleporters too? And while you are at it, why not spice things up with food replicators? But wait, you cannot leave out warp engines and photon torpedoes. You never know when you might need these things. All powered with CGTX tokens of course.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 09:22:38 PMToday, I want to share something truly astounding with you. This is not just another project, it's a revolution, it's Cogitex.Whenever I see wordings like this I have the idea that a shitcoin is in the making that will promise out-of-this-world conceptQuoteðŸš€ On the Brink of Space:We see Cogitex as the future of humanity in space. ðŸŒ• Journeys to the Moon:When Cogitex reaches maturity, the Moon will become a resort.ðŸš€ðŸš€ Colonizing Mars:And then, Mars will become a second Earth. Cogitex is the key to a new era. We're changing the rules of the game. Join us and shape the future alongside Cogitex.And remember, in the future, Cogitex is capable of everything.And I'm right only the genius of geniuses can think of concepts and plans like this of course their next plan of action is launching crowdfunding where they need billions of dollars to propel their imagination, I last heard this concept in conversations between idiots where they think of the wildest idea they can think of.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on September 16, 2023, 09:16:29 AMQuote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 09:22:38 PMToday, I want to share something truly astounding with you. This is not just another project, it's a revolution, it's Cogitex.Whenever I see wordings like this I have the idea that a shitcoin is in the making that will promise out-of-this-world conceptQuoteðŸš€ On the Brink of Space:We see Cogitex as the future of humanity in space. ðŸŒ• Journeys to the Moon:When Cogitex reaches maturity, the Moon will become a resort.ðŸš€ðŸš€ Colonizing Mars:And then, Mars will become a second Earth. Cogitex is the key to a new era. We're changing the rules of the game. Join us and shape the future alongside Cogitex.And remember, in the future, Cogitex is capable of everything.And I'm right only the genius of geniuses can think of concepts and plans like this of course their next plan of action is launching crowdfunding where they need billions of dollars to propel their imagination, I last heard this concept in conversations between idiots where they think of the wildest idea they can think of.I understand your concern, but it's important to remember that innovations often face doubts and criticism. Big ideas require funding for their realization, and crowdfunding is one way to attract the necessary resources. Many well-known projects and companies started with ambitious ideas and small investments.However, it's important that plans and actions are carefully reviewed and assessed. If you have arguments and data to support the notion that this project is not viable, the best way to persuade this individual is to provide constructive criticism and well-founded reasoning.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: rat4 on September 16, 2023, 09:56:42 AMHumans will leave my Earth?With Cogitex, humanity will have a second earth.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Well at least you don't have lack of pompous and outlandish advertising. With under $400 marketcap, you are not going to mars. You are not going even paying for the beer needed to keep that delusion up. Or to pay eth fees with the profits you get from this, which is the reason why this is a bep-20 token. This is why Bep-20 scams are targeting most gullible poor people out there.Just make a meme-token. Least they are honest on what they are.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 16, 2023, 09:59:39 AMQuote from: rat4 on September 16, 2023, 09:56:42 AMHumans will leave my Earth?With Cogitex, humanity will have a second earth.Aw, I think I might have heard this before from some certain personalities.There are case though in crypto that often times the project is being attack in the beginning, but then become successful. However, let's put things into perspective here, I mean how can you accomplished that?What will be the cost of it?And yeah, at least a meme token, you could get several groups to p&d it.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: TravelMug on September 16, 2023, 11:21:32 AMQuote from: Adigvcdh on September 16, 2023, 09:59:39 AMQuote from: rat4 on September 16, 2023, 09:56:42 AMHumans will leave my Earth?With Cogitex, humanity will have a second earth.Aw, I think I might have heard this before from some certain personalities.There are case though in crypto that often times the project is being attack in the beginning, but then become successful. However, let's put things into perspective here, I mean how can you accomplished that?What will be the cost of it?And yeah, at least a meme token, you could get several groups to p&d it.Well, yes, the concept of a second Earth might sound like science fiction, but let's look at it from a practical standpoint. We're talking about the future, about possibilities that can change the world.As for potential attacks or challenges, every project faces them. It's part of the journey to success. We believe in our goals and strategy.Regarding the cost, it will be determined by the market and demand. But our goal is to create value and provide unique opportunities that will make CGTX a valuable asset.And the meme token? Well, we're always up for some fun and a friendly atmosphere. But we also take our mission seriously and see big horizons ahead.

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 16, 2023, 11:29:01 AMRegarding the cost, it will be determined by the market and demand. But our goal is to create value and provide unique opportunities that will make CGTX a valuable asset.How exactly? How do you intend to generate value for your token? What purpose will it serve, and how will it be utilized? You mentioned a plan to colonize Mars, but such endeavors typically require significant time and resources. Where do you plan to secure funding for research and development?

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: Marvelman on September 16, 2023, 12:20:01 PMQuote from: Adigvcdh on September 16, 2023, 11:29:01 AMRegarding the cost, it will be determined by the market and demand. But our goal is to create value and provide unique opportunities that will make CGTX a valuable asset.How exactly? How do you intend to generate value for your token? What purpose will it serve, and how will it be utilized? You mentioned a plan to colonize Mars, but such endeavors typically require significant time and resources. Where do you plan to secure funding for research and development?Dear Friend,You have correctly observed that our ambitions are at cosmic heights, and I am ready to share more details on how we are going to create value for the Cogitex token.Research and Development: Our research and development in artificial intelligence (AI) and space technology will be funded by private investment and funds generated from the sale of CGTX tokens.Value to CGTX holders: The CGTX token will serve as a means to access our ecosystem, including AI services, space travel and many other opportunities. This creates demand for CGTX, which affects its value.Long-term goals: Our plans include colonizing Mars, but we recognize that this is a long-term goal that will require significant resources and time. We plan to raise additional funding through investments, partnerships and crowdfunding to achieve this ambitious goal.

comments.author: rat4
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 16, 2023, 09:59:39 AMWith Cogitex, humanity will have a second earth.With governments and prisons?

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: rat4 on September 16, 2023, 03:31:25 PMQuote from: Adigvcdh on September 16, 2023, 09:59:39 AMWith Cogitex, humanity will have a second earth.With governments and prisons?I understand, but we need to be realistic. Colonizing Mars is a complex task, and it will inevitably involve collaboration with governments and regulations. We aspire to innovate, but always with respect for laws and safety.
